Package com.rexsl.maven

Maven plugin.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Check
    Single check to be executed by CheckMojo.
    ChecksProvider
    Provider of checks.
    Environment
    Testing environment.
    Filter
    Filter to use.
    Packer
    Single packer to be executed by PackageMojo.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractRexslMojo
    Abstract mojo.
    CheckMojo
    Test the entire project against RESTful principles.
    MavenEnvironment
    Environment proxy, between Maven plugin and checks.
    PackageMojo
    Package resources.
    RunMojo
    Run WAR as a web server to enable interactive testing of a web application.

Package com.rexsl.maven Description

Maven plugin.

The only dependency you need is (check our latest version available at www.rexsl.com): 

<depedency>
   <groupId>com.rexsl</groupId>
   <artifactId>rexsl-maven-plugin</artifactId>
 </dependency>
Version:
$Id$
Author:
Yegor Bugayenko (yegor@tpc2.com)
